CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "ED-Encompass Program Distributor"), "Flow Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "FE-Flow End Customer"), "Flow Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "FM-Skid Manufacturer/OEM"), "Flow Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "OD-Flow Open Distribution"), "Flow Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "TD-Turf Distributor"), "Flow Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "WD-Wyco Distributor"), "WYCO Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "WE-Wyco End Customer/Contractor"), "WYCO Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "WM-WYCO OEM"), "WYCO Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "UC-Utility Customer"), "Utility Direct", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "DC-Distributor Customer"), "Water Distribution", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "IR-Flow Industrial/Commercial Rep"), "N/A – Manual", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "HA-Flow House Account"), "N/A – Manual", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "UO-Utility Other"), "N/A – Manual", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "UD-Utility Distributor"), "N/A – Manual", IF(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Type__c, "Converted from Lead"), "N/A – Manual", "N/A – Manual")))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: TMT Primary Sales Credit
